name: Ruined Arcadia
description:
Darkness has spread across the land. The Master's light has all but faded. When all hope is lost, a glimmer beams through the shadows.

In this dark action-platformer take up the role of Acerola, an enigmatic little mage who's in over her head amidst an expansive world overtaken by darkness.

Journey through malice-filled caves, scale mighty tower walls, and fight grandiose boss fights as you attempt to rid the world of evil, and rescue the ruined kingdom of Arcadia.

DEMO VERSION - GAME STILL IN DEVELOPMENT (Donations greatly appreciated and help immensely)
